ygData.subject: Re: NUNCHUCKS! COOL!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: that is a valid suggestion. we could  make the higher level nun-chuck, proc a longer lasting stun (with a minor 50 point DD on it - at high levels 50 points IS
ygData.messageBody:
that is a valid suggestion.
we could make the higher level nun-chuck, proc a longer lasting stun
(with a minor 50 point DD on it - at high levels 50 points IS NOTHING)
and perhaps increase its damge to 10?
making it a DUAL weildable 10/16 ass ripper of a weapon!

On Fri, 27 Aug 1999, Noah D. Burt wrote:

> From: "Noah D. Burt" <noahburt@...>
>
> I like the way this is headed. I don't need anything
> so dramatic though. A stun would be great. Perhaps the
> TT throw effect too. A DOT, I am not so sure about. I
> don't want or need that kind of magic. i'd rather do
> more damage or make the MOB do less damage. Simplicity
> is elegant.
>
> > On Fri, 27 Aug 1999, Imari J. A. Dellimore wrote:
> >
> > > From: "Imari J. A. Dellimore" <ijad@...>
> > >
> > >
> > > yes! why, oh why didnt we think of this before?
> > > OOOOOOOOH!
> > >
> > > Ok ok, stay calm....
> > > we gotta make a petition!
> > > NOt one of those whining petitions begging variant
> > to make our class
> > > stronger, but a petition asking to get out class
> > some more items and
> > > attention. All the suggestions I have read so far
> > are cool! And I think
> > > they would go along way to improving the game in a
> > meaningfull way.
> > >
> > > Ideas for nun-chucks:
> > >
> > > They should use the hand to hand skill
> > > Monk only
> > > There should be 3 levels of nunchucks:
> > >
> > > A high level variant would be 7dmg/16 delay proc
> > dooming darkness level
> > > 34 necro spell? (correct me if I am wrong)
> > >
> > > Obtainablity:
> > > Obtainable through a level 40+
> > > multi group effort similar to the Soulfire or
> > flesh ripper type require
> > > ments. I would locate this weapon somehwere in
> > LOWER GUK or SOL B.
> > >
> > > Balance issues:
> > > Bear in mind that with 7 base damge a level 40
> > will only hit for 21-25
> > > max damage with these nunchucks vs 35+ with his
> > fists, the DOT makes up
> > > for the loss in damage, and I think that the 16
> > delay is faster than our
> > > fists?)
> > >
> > > _________________
> > >
> > >
> > > Mid level version should do 6dmg/17delay and proc
> > stun
> > >
> > > Obtainability:
> > > Obtainable in a single level 30+ group.
> > > Locate this in some dungeon but at a reasonably
> > accessible place in a
> > > level 35 critter? the depths of UPPER GUK or SOL
> > A, or the front part of
> > > LOWER GUKS LIVE SIDE or SOL B are candidates, As
> > Is NAJENA)
> > >
> > > Balance:
> > > Stun is such a cool spell.
> > > It is a great way to taunt a creature, and it
> > saves SO much damage
> > > - at leve 30 mobs hit for around 70+ a pop and
> > they double attack often!
> > > Stun is just want a monk needs to help keep stuff
> > off his groups casters
> > > and to save himself a good 140 to 420 points of
> > damge! Nothing to sneeze
> > > at.
> > > At level 30 you will hitting for 18 a pop with
> > this weapon vs 30+ with
> > > your fists. but the delay is faster i think. I
> > say again anyone know the
> > > delay on our fists?
> > >
> > > _____________________
> > >
> > >
> > > Low level variant should do 6 damge/20 delay and
> > proc root?
> > >
> > > Obtainability:
> > > Good level 15+ group
> > > Locate it in a dungeon like Crushbone or Befallen
> > >
> > > Balance issues:
> > > At level 15 a monk will probably be better off
> > using his fists
> > > except for the nifty root that these weapons
> > cast, allowing him to tackle
> > > creatures in dungeons. This weapon is not meant to
> > be a be all or end all.
> > > Just a nifty looking addition to the players
> > wardrobe.
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > > What do you guys think? what is the effect delay
> > on our fist punches
> > > anyone know?
> > >
> > > ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
> > ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
> > > ~ ~ ~ ~
> > > I.J.A. Dellimore Degrees: EE & PHYSICS
> > > Email:ijad@... Duke '98.
> > >
> >
> --------------------------------------------------------------------------
> > >
> > >
> > > On Fri, 27 Aug 1999, Dizzy J. wrote:
> > >
> > > > From: "Dizzy J." <dizzyj@...>
> > > >
> > > > I just want to duelweild nunchucks (sp?)
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > On Fri, 27 Aug 1999, Ronnie wrote:
> > > >
> > > > > From: "Ronnie" <ronnien@...>
> > > > >
> > > > > A monk only weapon, now before someone say but
> > out fists are our weapons
> > > > > listen for a sec. Wouldn't it be cool if
> > there were magic gloves with
> > > > > effects? I personally would love to wield a
> > pair of gloves that cast an
> > > > > effect, like life tap or shock of frost.
> > There are just not enough Monk
> > > > > only stuff out there, other then the PoF stuff
> > and the sashes and head bands
> > > > > I think this would be a nice addition, maybe
> > along with a nifty looking robe
> > > > > for monks.
> > > > >
> > > > > Palerose Darkthron ~24 circle monk of the
> > Ashen order~ (Tunare server)
> > > > >
> > > > >
